thread.title: Pompeo wants "swagger back" at State Dept

title: Pompeo wants "swagger back" at State Dept
text:
Pompeo wants "swagger back" at State Dept 3:21pm EDT - 02:08
Newly sworn-in Secretary of State Mike Pompeo says he wants the State Department to get its ''swagger back'' and said he was commited to dismantling North Korea's nuclear program ''without delay''. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Newly sworn-in Secretary of State Mike Pompeo says he wants the State Department to get its "swagger back" and said he was commited to dismantling North Korea's nuclear program "without delay".
